CustomField.description: JSON map of per-object exclusion filters. Format: {"Account": "Type != 'VIP'", "Lead": "Rating != 'Hot'"}. These conditions are automatically appended to pattern detection queries to protect sensitive records from automation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: JSON map of exclusion filters by object. Example: {"Account": "Type != 'Strategic'", "Lead": "Rating != 'Hot'"}
CustomField.label: Global Exclusion Filter
